content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision in a legal case regarding inheritance the court fees amounted to 81 euros and the heirs are responsible for paying 13 of these costs the procedure lasted for 9 months and 27 days the final resolution involves the distribution of goods and payment of pension benefits the total value of the goods is 1727 euros which has been transferred to a personal bank account there are three heirs involved the deceaseds son will receive half of the inheritance while the two granddaughters will each receive a quarter the court followed the succession proceedings according to the inheritance act and held a probate hearing one heir accepted their share while another did not respond within the given time limit the court ruled on the case and determined the extent of the estate the heirs can take possession of the movable property once the final decision on the succession is obtained the text also provides instructions on how to appeal a decision including the time limit required documents and payment of a court fee
